author: Michelle2815CV

text: Ah I see.  I was confused because I have the CD OST import of Akumaj≈ç Dracula X Chi no Rondo (the 2-disc set with the Bloodlines soundtrack on the 2nd) and made my comment based on that.  Then I checked my digital copy of the Dracula X Chronicles OST and the names were switched on disc 2, back to the correct way like you said with this being Opus and Slash being the 3 minute song, :).  Hooray for 1994 misprints, lol!
author: assgoblin2damax

text: I just read up on all of this confusion between both tracks and there's a simple reason behind all this: The Rondo of Blood OST switched the names by mistake. It's been confirmed now, even by Iga. The name switch has been fixed though with games like Chronicles and Judgement. So this is truly "Opus 13". :)
author: SupraDarky

text: I think this song is actually really "Slash" from Rondo.  I know it sounds similar to Opus. 13 since they are in the same stage but Opus is actually lasts 3:21 on the soundtrack while Slash is 1:25 and is more jazzy.  They have different intros though.
